title: How to download copyrighted music videos from YouTube online without paying - Quora

response.answer_text: You could just download by typing “ss” before “youtube” in the URL. When you're watching your desired video, see the URL, it says, something like “www.youtube…” Now, change it to “www.ssyoutube…” and press Enter. You will be taken to a site where you can choose your quality and download the video. Downloading copyrighted material is however not good. Be careful.

You can download by using Youtube videos music downloader by Piyush Suthar Or Just install any of the extensions shared here and download music and videos in one click. Top 5 Chrome Extension to Download YouTube Video - Innovative Beast Thanks
